title: Conc. vs time graph for second order reaction

content.question:
X â†’ products
Pure substance X decomposes according to the equation above. Which of the following graphs indicates that the rate of decomposition is second order in X ?

choices.label: A graph plots concentration of X versus time. The graph shows a line with a positive slope rising from a point on the vertical axis.
A graph plots concentration of X versus time. The graph shows a line with a negative slope declining from a point on the vertical axis.
A graph plots 1 over concentration of X, versus, time. The graph shows a line with a positive slope rising from a point on the vertical axis.
A graph plots 1 over concentration of X, versus, time. The graph shows a line with a negative slope declining from a point on the vertical axis.

content.answer: A graph plots 1 over concentration of X, versus, time. The graph shows a line with a positive slope rising from a point on the vertical axis.

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
